SELECT hcr.request_id, hcr.concurrent_id, hc.conc_code, hct.conc_name, hcr.executable_id, hcr.cycle_flag, hcr.interval_type, hcr.interval_number, hcr.interval_hour, hcr.interval_minute, hcr.interval_second, hcr.cron, hcr.request_param, hcr.start_date, hcr.end_date, hcr.executor_id, hcr.job_id, hcr.tenant_id, ht.tenant_name, hji.parent_id, hcr.object_version_number FROM hsdr_conc_request hcr JOIN hsdr_concurrent hc ON hc.concurrent_id = hcr.concurrent_id LEFT JOIN hsdr_concurrent_tl hct ON hc.concurrent_id = hct.concurrent_id AND hct.lang = #{lang} LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl ht ON ht.tenant_id = hcr.tenant_id AND ht.lang = #{lang} LEFT JOIN hsdr_job_info hji ON hcr.job_id = hji.job_id WHERE hcr.request_id = #{requestId}
AND hcr.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
